data.title: DIRECTV Ultimate Package
data.meta_description: Learn more about DIRECTV's Ultimate Package including its channel lineup, discounted price, free offers and more.
data.text:
If your household has a variety of tastes or you just need more options, DIRECTV Ultimate packs quite a punch. The second-largest plan available from DIRECTV (Premier tops the list), its locked-in price is $104.99/mo, with HD included for life. A rich mix of over 270 channels, the Ultimate plan really ups the ante when it comes to movies; get all the details below...

For its complete lineup, see the section below:

Ultimate Channel Lineup

Questions? Call 1-855-239-7313Compare to other plans Channel Number HD

Where to find this package:

As of , get Ultimate at the lowest price available below, either online or over the phone...

Cost breakdown: Ultimate Plan

Here's the full price breakdown for DIRECTV's Ultimate Plan, including DVR, installation and other monthly charges. Keep in mind state or local governments can add additional charges to your bill. The set-up below assumes the Genie DVR with 1 TV hooked up.

Current deals for this plan include a 2-year price-lock a Visa gift card (for new customers). There's also a $10/mo discount for having paperless billing and autopay; you must get it setup within 30 days of activation. After your 2-year contract ends, it converts into a month-to-month (cancel anytime) and you pay the prevailing rate at that time.
